Unique Class Feature

Flurry of Blows (Action): Using a Bonus action and a Ki Point, punch twice in quick succession. Equivalent to two normal unarmed attacks. Ki: To perform special abilities Unarmoured Defense: Your reflexes are as effective as any armour. While not wearing armour, you add your Wisdom Modifier to your Armour Class.
